definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
universities and colleges/abbr. for 高等學校|高等学校
the school (as a party in a contract, dispute etc)/the school authorities
driving school/abbr. for 駕駛學校|驾驶学校

sentences.english: It depends on which country you are planning to go.
sentences.chinese: 考哪种试是得依据外国粹校的请求的。

sentences.english: I'm planning to run for the school board.
sentences.chinese: 我打算竞选联合校董事会董事。

sentences.english: The first school year school excellent league member, the institute debates match second.
sentences.chinese: 第一学年校优秀团员，学院辩论赛第二名。

sentences.english: The savant foolishly took the school cooling pool because swimming pond.
sentences.chinese: 壆者愚蠢的把壆校的冷却池当成游泳池。

sentences.english: Education Department announces closure of morning and all-day schools.
sentences.chinese: 教育署宣布上午校和全日制学校停课。

sentences.english: My teacher parked his car outside the gate.
sentences.chinese: 我的老师把车停在了校门外。

sentences.english: From collection to collation, they did a great deal of painstaking and careful job of proofreading and correcting.
sentences.chinese: 从搜集到整理书籍，他们作了大量细致的校雠工作。

sentences.english: When I returned home last night, an incident that happened at school was reported to me.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我回家的时候，校方向我汇报一件事情。

sentences.english: The school bus rolled us to the airport.
I am a basketball player ever.
sentences.chinese: 我曾是校篮球队的一员。

sentences.english: The paper tries to research and analyze the psychological problems of the freshmen in agricultural science colleges, as well as solutions.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图探索与剖析农科院校新生的心理问题及对策。

sentences.english: The school bell having rung, the students dashed out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 校钟响了，学生们便冲出了教室。

sentences.english: The 3rd-grader had recently been elected to the student council at school.
sentences.chinese: 这位三年级学生刚入选校学生会不久。

sentences.english: For good measure, the board provided wireless Internet access at school.
sentences.chinese: 此外，校董事会还为学校提供了无线上网的便利条件。

sentences.english: Well there are also sometimes ads in the Harvard Crimson and the other college newspapers for sperm donors.
sentences.chinese: 在哈佛校报上和其他院校登过找精子捐赠者的广告。

sentences.english: The scholar foolishly took the school cooling pond for swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 壆者愚蠢的把壆校的冷却池当成游泳池。

definition: attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
abbr. for 師範大學|师范大学[shi1 fan4 da4 xue2], normal university/teacher training college
subsidiary primary school (originally attached to an institute, university etc)/abbreviation of 附屬小學|附属小学
